abstract: Vasek Pospisil beats Juan Martin del Potro, 6-4, 7-6 (7), in first round of Miami Open.
lead_paragraph: Playing his first match since Jan. 15, del Potro lost to Vasek Pospisil in the first round of the Miami Open, 6-4, 7-6 (7).

headline.main: Juan Martín Del Potro Loses in Return
headline.print_headline: Del Potro Loses in His Return

snippet: Playing his first match since Jan. 15, del Potro lost to Vasek Pospisil in the first round of the Miami Open, 6-4, 7-6 (7).
